title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Vespucci Job (Remix)
content:
Jump behind the wheel in this high speed, remixed version of a classic mode where one driver races against time to collect checkpoints while everyone else hunts them down. Take your shot at victory with 2X GTA$ and RP on The Vespucci Job (Remix) through March 26.

Jump into the action by heading over to the Featured Series in Legion Square.
